document.full_text: sally meyerhoff, a top american marathoner who was training for the 2012 olympic trials, was killed when she was struck by a pickup truck while riding her bicycle.
document.title: sports briefing | running: marathoner killed by pickup
lines_and_colors: sally meyerhoff, a top american marathoner who was training for the 2012 olympic trials, was killed when she was struck by a pickup truck while riding her bicycle.
